thread.title: SNL Skewers Jeff Sessions: ‘Life is Like a Box of Chocolates, Sure Are a Lot of Brown Ones in There’
thread.title_full: SNL Skewers Jeff Sessions: ‘Life is Like a Box of Chocolates, Sure Are a Lot of Brown Ones in There’

author: Jon Levine
title: SNL Skewers Jeff Sessions: ‘Life is Like a Box of Chocolates, Sure Are a Lot of Brown Ones in There’
text:
Trump Asks If It’s Legal For Obama to Wiretap Him… Here is the Answer video SNL Skewers Jeff Sessions: ‘Life is Like a Box of Chocolates, Sure Are a Lot of Brown Ones in There’ by Jon Levine | 11:44 pm, March 4th, 2017 
Saturday Night Live returned to the small screen with a send up of embattled Attorney General, Jeff Sessions . In an extended parody of Forrest Gump , the role was once again reprised by Kate McKinnon . 
“You meet so many nice people,” in the White House, McKinnon said to fellow SNL cast member Leslie Jones , while both sat on a bench. “Life is like a box of chocolates, sure are a lot of brown ones in there,” said McKinnon, hitting Sessions southern drawl with precision. 
McKinnon waxed on with a rotating cast of SNL characters, in the process pillorying the slew of Russia related problems now swirling around the Attorney General. 
“I never talk to any Russians ever, and that’s all I got to say about that.” 
This week’s episode will feature Hidden Figures Star Octavia Spencer with musical Father John Misty 
Have a tip we should know? Follow Mediaite
